clues.vague: There are scorch marks in the house.

clues.specific: X's medieval sword was the most dangerous item in the house.
X drowned in a well. Might not enjoy being wet...

clues.vague: X is accustomed to the dark.

clues.specific: If you use a dagger against X, you must be fast.
clues.vague: Be careful, X lost a dagger around here somewhere...

fire: A painful burn marked X's left hand.
blades: Medieval weaponry was one of X's favorite topics.
X can make a mean chopped salad.
X only had nine and a half fingers after an unfortunate chopping incedent.
water: A terrible rainstorm occured the night X was born.
No one enjoyed shaking X's hand, because it was always moist.
